headline.main: Facebook Messenger Switch Controversy Is Part Misunderstanding, Part Mistrust

docs.snippet: Facebook users are angry over a forced migration to the company’s Messenger app and worried about its privacy implications. Are they overreacting?...

headline.print_headline: Russian Accused of Hacking Is Arraigned in Seattle
headline.main: Russian Accused of Hacking Is Arraigned in Seattle

docs.snippet: A Russian lawmaker's son accused of hacking computers at hundreds of U.S. businesses and stealing credit card information pleaded not guilty to 29 charges Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Russian lawmaker's son accused of hacking computers at hundreds of U.S. businesses and stealing credit card information pleaded not guilty to 29 charges Friday.

headline.print_headline: Virginia Asks for Review of Gay Marriage Ruling
headline.main: Virginia Asks for Review of Gay Marriage Ruling

docs.snippet: Virginia Attorney General Mark Herring has asked the U.S. Supreme Court to review a decision that struck down the state's ban on same-sex marriage, although he supports the lower court's decision....
docs.lead_paragraph: Virginia Attorney General Mark Herring has asked the U.S. Supreme Court to review a decision that struck down the state's ban on same-sex marriage, although he supports the lower court's decision.

headline.main: Chimney Swift: Suited for Ashes and Soot

docs.snippet: Originally denizens of old, undisturbed woodlands, the chimney swift became one of several animal species strongly associated with, and even reliant upon, human habitation....
docs.abstract: Originally denizens of old, undisturbed woodlands, the chimney swift became one of several animal species strongly associated with, and even reliant upon, human habitation.

headline.print_headline: Italian Holdouts in Argentina Debt Dispute Make Play for Cash
headline.main: Italian Holdouts in Argentina Debt Dispute Make Play for Cash

docs.snippet: Italian retirees holding defaulted Argentine debt from 2002 and who spurned Buenos Aires' restructuring offers are seeking to force Bank of New York Mellon to pay out their court judgments from frozen money due holders who accepted the government'...
docs.lead_paragraph: Italian retirees holding defaulted Argentine debt from 2002 and who spurned Buenos Aires' restructuring offers are seeking to force Bank of New York Mellon to pay out their court judgments from frozen money due holders who accepted the government's terms.

headline.print_headline: Kiermaier's Hit in 10th Gives Rays 4-3 Win
headline.main: Kiermaier's Hit in 10th Gives Rays 4-3 Win

docs.snippet: Kevin Kiermaier, who entered the game in the eighth inning, drove in the game-winning run with a single in the 10th to give the Tampa Bay Rays a 4-3 victory over the Chicago Cubs on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Kevin Kiermaier, who entered the game in the eighth inning, drove in the game-winning run with a single in the 10th to give the Tampa Bay Rays a 4-3 victory over the Chicago Cubs on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Former New Jersey Republican Official Shot Dead in Apparent Murder-Suicide
headline.main: Former New Jersey Republican Official Shot Dead in Apparent Murder-Suicide

docs.snippet: A former New Jersey Republican official who once worked with Governor Chris Christie was found dead along with her husband inside their home, officials said on Friday, in what appeared to be a murder-suicide....
docs.lead_paragraph: A former New Jersey Republican official who once worked with Governor Chris Christie was found dead along with her husband inside their home, officials said on Friday, in what appeared to be a murder-suicide.

headline.print_headline: Villa Sign French Fullback Cissokho From Valencia
headline.main: Villa Sign French Fullback Cissokho From Valencia

docs.snippet: Aston Villa have signed left back Aly Cissokho from Valencia on a four-year deal subject to international clearance, the Premier League club announced on Friday....

headline.print_headline: Woods Misses Fourth Major Cut as a Pro at PGA
headline.main: Woods Misses Fourth Major Cut as a Pro at PGA

docs.snippet: A badly out-of-sorts Tiger Woods missed the fourth major cut of his professional career after again struggling with his game in the second round of the PGA Championship on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A badly out-of-sorts Tiger Woods missed the fourth major cut of his professional career after again struggling with his game in the second round of the PGA Championship on Friday.

headline.sub: Israel strikes Gaza after talks fail to extend truce
headline.main: Israel strikes Gaza after talks fail to extend truce

docs.snippet: Israel launches air strikes across the Gaza Strip in response to Palestinian rockets, after Egyptian-mediated talks fail to extend a 72-hour truce. Gavino Garay reports....
